title: Islamic Golden Age and Scientific Achievements

vocab.definition: A period of great learning and achievement in the Islamic world
The capital city that became a center of Islamic learning
A famous library and research center in Baghdad
A branch of mathematics developed by Islamic scholars
The act of keeping knowledge and texts safe for the future

teachingNotes: Emphasize how Islamic scholars preserved and expanded upon Greek and Roman knowledge. Discuss contributions to math, science, and medicine.

sample.question: What was the period of great learning in the Islamic world called?

truefalse.question: Islamic scholars made important contributions to mathematics and science.

multiplechoice.question: Which city became a major center of Islamic learning?

fillintheblank.question: The famous library in Baghdad was called the House of ________.

shortanswer.question: How did Islamic scholars help preserve ancient knowledge?
